JEdPoint
Class PointNumber

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--JEdPoint.PointNumber
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class PointNumber
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

A point number class used to store / handle point numbers.

Used mainly to store all four point number ints in one place. Can also make a PointNumber out of a string and a PointNumber into a string.

See Also:
Serialized Form

parsePointNumber

public static JEdPoint.PointNumber parsePointNumber(java.lang.String stringToParse)
                                             throws java.lang.NumberFormatException
Converts a String to a PointNumber.

The String should be in either "zone:net/node" or "zone:net/node.point" format. Not including the point number will make the point 0.

java.lang.NumberFormatException

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Converts the point number to a String.
